mapper.insert: insert into employee_institution_datadictionaryView (EmployeeNum, EmployeeID, EmployeeName, EmployeeSex, EmployeeBirth, Photo, EmployeeIDNum, EmployeeTel, InstitutionNum, InstitutionName, InstitutionPrefix, CurrentWorkNum, WorkStyleNum, WorkPositionNum, InStationDate, OutStationDate, WorkType, HomeAddress, JoinCompanyDate, OutCompanyDate, OnState, RetireTime, IsRetire, CurrentWorkValue, WorkPositionValue, WorkStyleValue, workTypevalue, OutCompanyOrNot, Category, InsuranceNum, InsuredTime) values (#{employeeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{employeeSex,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{employeeBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeIDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeTel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{institutionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institutionName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{institutionPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentWorkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workStyleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workPositionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inStationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outStationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinCompanyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outCompanyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{retireTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRetire,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentWorkValue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{workPositionValue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{workStyleValue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{workTypevalue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{outCompanyOrNot,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over (order by EmployeeNum desc) as rn,* from employee_institution_datadictionaryView ${conditions} ) A where rn>${start} and ${start}+${limit}>=rn ;
select count(*) as _sum from (select row_number() over (order by EmployeeNum desc) as rn,* from employee_institution_datadictionaryView ${conditions}) A;
